description: Combining bourbon with dark rum, heavy cream, vanilla extract, simple syrup, and a dash of grated nutmeg, you can create a delightful drink that’s fit for a king! Bourbon Milk Punch is a delectable, versatile cocktail that you can enjoy frozen, cold, or even warm.
name: Bourbon Milk Punch
recipeIngredient: Dash of grated nutmeg for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice up to ¾ full.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice up to ¾ full.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the rum, bourbon, cream, syrup, and extract. Shake vigorously for about 30 seconds.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the rum, bourbon, cream, syrup, and extract. Shake vigorously for about 30 seconds.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain the mixture into a mug or any drinking glass of your choice.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain the mixture into a mug or any drinking glass of your choice.

recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle some grated nutmeg over the drink. Serve and enjoy!
